nodes.text: Refain was a male Chagrian adjudicator of the Department of Adjudication of the Galactic Republic at the time of the Galactic War.
Refain served as an adjudicator of the Department of Adjudication of the Galactic Republic by the time of the Galactic War.

He led fellow adjudicators in the seizure of Czerka Arms' assets and the negotiations with Torkel Laphmer, a senior Czerka executive with information on the classified moon facility, CZ-198. He would call for assistance from a Republic strike team to help in the Seizure of CZ-198 due to Laphmer's information about the threats contained with the secret facility.
Around 3627 BBY, Refain oversaw the operation of a strike team into the CI-004 Research Facility, a Czerka complex on the moon Dxun.

Refain is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel released by BioWare in 2013. He is voiced by Fred Tatasciore. He appears again in the 2019 sixth expansion Onslaught.
